headline.main: 4% LOAN OF VICHY TAKEN UP QUICKLY; Subscriptions Are Closed After It Brings in a Total of 12,000,000,000 Francs

lead_paragraph: VICHY, Oct. 12 -- Subscriptions to the 4 per cent loan of the national sinking fund were closed yesterday after having attained a total of 12,000,000,000 francs. The success of this operation was no surprise, for it offers important advantages to the Treasury and the new issue also is attractive to idle capital.
abstract: natl sinking fund 4% loan subscriptions closed
